verses.verse: So if you were gotten up together with the Anointed King, look for the things above where the Anointed King is sitting in the right side of God.
Focus on the things above, not the things on the earth.
You see, you died and your life has been hidden together with the Anointed King in God.
When the Anointed King (our life) is shown, at that time you also will be shown with Him in magnificence.
So deaden your body parts (the ones on the earth): sexual sin, desire that is not clean, lust, bad desire and the desire for more (something that idol worship is),
because of which, the punishment of God comes on the sons of the unbelief,
among whom you also traipsed around in the past when you were living among them.
But right now you also must put away all these things: punishment, anger, badness, a hurtful comment, a shameful word from your mouth.
Don't lie to each other after stripping away the former person together with the things it repeatedly does
and after putting on the young person, the one who is renewed to a correct understanding in line with the image of the One who created him,
where there is not Greek and Jewish, circumcision and uncircumcision, foreigner, savage, slave, free, but the Anointed King is all and in all.
So put on (as God's select people, sacred and having been loved) sympathy of compassions, kindness, lowly focus, humility, patience

(as you tolerate each other and forgive each other as an act of generosity; if anyone has a complaint toward anyone, just as the Anointed King also forgave you as an act of generosity, so you also must forgive),
but over all these things, the love, something that is a bond of the completeness.
And the peace of God must referee in your hearts, into which you were also invited in one body. And become thankful.

The message of the Anointed King must have a house in you richly in every insight, teaching and cautioning yourselves with psalms, praise songs, and spiritual songs as you sing in generosity in your hearts to the Master.
And everything, whatever you do in word or in action, do all things in the name of the Master Jesus, being thankful to the God and Father through Him.
The Women — Place yourselves under your own husbands, as it was meeting the high standards in the Master.
The Men — Love the wives, and do not be bitter toward them.
The Children — Obey the parents regarding all things. You see, this is very satisfying to the Master.
The Fathers — Don't provoke your children so that they may not feel dejected.
The Slaves — Regarding all things, obey the masters regarding the physical body, not in eye-slavery, as people-satisfiers, but in dedication of heart, fearing God.
And everything, whatever you do, work from the soul as if it is for the Master and not for people,
realizing that you will fully receive the repayment of the inheritance out from the Master. You see, you are slaves to the Master, the Anointed King.
The person who does wrong will retrieve what he did wrong in, and there is no favoritism.
